settings.richtext:
IN-STORE PICKUP!

Once you have items in your cart use the form below to select in-store pickup. Please read all the information, and completely fill out the form so we can process your order for pickup.

We'll refund any shipping costs after your order is fulfilled and call or email you when your order is ready at the location of your choice!

For more information on shipping services, check out our shipping policy page or email us at shipping@dirtycoast.com if you have any questions!

settings.local_pickup_text:
CHOOSE THE STORE YOU WISH FOR LOCAL PICKUP.


Please fill out this form using the same Name and Email Address used at checkout.

Your shipping costs will be refunded once the order is fulfilled.
settings.popupDescription: For in-store pick up, you will be charged shipping costs at checkout to secure your order. All Shipping Costs will be refunded after your order is fulfilled. You will receive an email confirmation from our shipping team with instructions and information regarding your in-store pick up order.
